definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: one lifted up, i.e. a chief prince;—abs. ´[[נ]] Ex 22:27 +; cstr. [[נְשִׂיא]] Ge 23:6 +; pl. [[נְשִׂיאִים]] Jos 22:32 +, [[נְשִׂיאִים]] Jos 22:32 +, [[נְשִׂאִים]] Ex 34:31 + 7 t., [[נְשִׂיאִם]] Ge 17:20 + 3 t., [[נְשִׂאִם]] Ex 35:27; cstr. [[נְשִׂיאֵי]] Ex 16:22 +; sf. [[נְשִׂיאַי]] Ez Eze 45:8, [[נְשִׂיאֶיהָ]] Ez Eze 32:29, [[נְשִׂיאֵיהֶם]] Nu 17:21, [[נְשִׂיאֵהֶם]] v:Nu 17:2, etc.;—mostly in Isr.:
[[בְּעַמְְּ]] ´[[נ]] of any chief man, Ex 22:27 (E; human ruler, over ag. [[אֱלֽהִים]]).
of Solom. 1Ki 11:34. Elsewhere only Ez P Chr:—
of Abr. Ge 23:6, and heads of Ishmaelite tribes Ge 17:20, Ge 25:16.

rulers of the congregation, [[נְשִׂיאֵי הָעֵדָה]] Ex 16:22, Jos 9:15, Jos 9:18, Jos 22:30, [[בָּעֵדָה]] ´[[הַנּ]] Ex 34:31, cf. Ex 35:27, Le 4:22, Jos 9:18 b, Jos 9:19, Jos 9:21, Jos 9:21, Jos 17:4, Jos 22:14, Jos 22:14, Jos 22:14, Jos 22:32 (all P); esp.

tribal chiefs and representatives, acc. to the religious organization of P, Nu 1:16, Nu 1:44, Nu 2:3 + 57 t. Nu (esp. chaps. 2, 7, 34; note [[נְשִׂיא נְשִׂיאֵי הַלֵּוִי]] Nu 3:32); cf. 1Ch 2:10, 1Ch 4:38, 1Ch 5:6, 1Ch 7:40, 2Ch 1:2, also 1Ki 8:1 (prob. gloss, om. LXX Benz), 2Ch 5:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of Zedekiah (for [[מֶלֶךְ]] v. Böhmer:8K 1900, 112 ff.), Eze 7:27, Eze 12:10, Eze 12:12, Eze 21:30, + Eze 19:1 (rd. sg. LXX Ew Hi Co Berthol Toy).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: chief men of Judah Eze 21:17, Eze 22:6, Eze 45:8, Eze 45:9.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: future Davidic kg. Eze 34:24, Eze 37:25, cf. Eze 44:3, Eze 44:3 + 16 t. Ez Eze 45, Eze 46, Eze 48.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: foreign princes Eze 26:16, Eze 27:21, Eze 30:13, Eze 32:29, Eze 38:2, Eze 38:3, Eze 39:1, Eze 39:18.
leader of exiles returning under Cyrus, acc. to Ezr 1:8.
non-Isr. chiefs in P: Ge 34:2, Nu 25:18, Jos 13:21.
